*Java*

 # Download and unpack the [http://download.forge.objectweb.org/asm/asm-3.2-bin.zip ASM instrumentation framework]
 # Check out Dimmunix source code
{{{
svn checkout http://dimmunix.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/java/src dimmunix-java-src
}}}
 # Compile Dimmunix 
{{{
cd dimmunix-java-src/Dimmunix
ant
cd ../DimmunixInstrumentation
ant
}}}

*C/C++*

 # Install scons, g++, gcc, make. To install these packages in Ubuntu, run:
{{{
sudo apt-get install make gcc g++ scons
}}}
 # Checkout Dimmunix source code
{{{
svn checkout http://dimmunix.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/pthreads/src dimmunix-pthreads-src
}}}
 # Compile Dimmunix
{{{
cd dimmunix-pthreads-src/
scons
}}}
 This will create libdimmunix.so shared library (in folder dimmunix-pthreads-src), that can be linked through LD_PRELOAD to any C/C++ application.
